lines.text: I hear in Canada you only have sex doggy style; that way you can both see the hockey game.
Siskel and Ebert caught my show. They gave me one finger up.
What a place, Canada; they started a country and no one showed up.
Remember folks, every man has his tale of woe. Unfortunately, in life, there's more woe than tale.
I looked up your family tree. Two dogs were using it.
And remember, it's lonely at the top, when there's no-one on the bottom.
I am here to spread Joy, tell when you find her.
